languages.text: Долгие годы Ирлиэт оставалась спутницей Вольного Торговца, помогая разгадывать тайны сгинувших ксенорас и делясь мудростью своего народа. Полвека спустя она поняла, что пришла пора проститься — ее Путь Изгоя подошел к концу.

For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her kind. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.
languages.original_text: Долгие годы Ирлиэт оставалась спутницей Вольного Торговца, помогая разгадывать тайны сгинувших ксенорас и делясь мудростью своего народа. Полвека спустя она поняла, что пришла пора проститься — ее Путь Изгоя подошел к концу.

traits.locale_text: For many long years, Yrliet travelled alongside the Rogue Trader, helping {mf|him|her} to decipher the secrets of lost xenos races, and imbuing {mf|him|her} with the wisdom of her people. Half a century later she sensed that it was time to bid goodbye — a Path of the Outcast has come to the end for her.

For many long years, Yrliet travelled alongside the Rogue Trader, helping {mf|him|her} to decipher the secrets of lost xenos races, and imbuing {mf|him|her} with the wisdom of her people. Half a century later she sensed that it was time to bid goodbye — a Path of the Outcast has come to the end for her.

For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her people. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.

For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her people. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.

For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her kind. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.

For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her kind. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.

languages.text: 在很长一段时间里，伊莉耶特始终陪伴在行商浪人的身边，帮助{mf|他|她}破译失落异形的秘密，借予{mf|他|她}族人的智慧。半个世纪过后，她意识到是时候告别了，她的流浪者道途已走到了尽头。
languages.original_text: For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her kind. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.

traits.locale_text: 在很长一段时间里，伊莉耶特始终陪伴在行商浪人的身边，帮助{mf|他|她}破译失落异形的秘密，借予{mf|他|她}族人的智慧。半个世纪过后，她意识到是时候告别了，她的流浪者道途已走到了尽头。

languages.text: Viele Jahre lang reiste Yrliet an der Seite {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, half {mf|ihm|ihr}, die Geheimnisse verlorener Xenos-Spezies zu enträtseln, und lieh {mf|ihm|ihr} die Weisheit ihres Volks. Ein halbes Jahrhundert später spürte sie, dass es Zeit für den Abschied war. Sie war am Ende des Pfads der Ausgestoßenen angelangt.
languages.original_text: For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her kind. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.

traits.locale_text: Viele Jahre lang reiste Yrliet an der Seite {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}, half {mf|ihm|ihr}, die Geheimnisse verlorener Xenos-Spezies zu enträtseln, und lieh {mf|ihm|ihr} die Weisheit ihres Volks. Ein halbes Jahrhundert später spürte sie, dass es Zeit für den Abschied war. Sie war am Ende des Pfads der Ausgestoßenen angelangt.

languages.text: Pendant de nombreuses années, Yrliet voyagea aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, l'aidant à déchiffrer les secrets des races xénos disparues et lui enseignant les savoirs de ses congénères. Un demi-siècle plus tard, elle sentit que le moment était venu de faire ses adieux : elle avait atteint la fin de la Voie de l'Errance.
languages.original_text: For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her kind. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.

traits.locale_text: Pendant de nombreuses années, Yrliet voyagea aux côtés {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, l'aidant à déchiffrer les secrets des races xénos disparues et lui enseignant les savoirs de son peuple. Un demi-siècle plus tard, elle sentit que le moment était venu de faire ses adieux : elle avait atteint la fin de la Voie de l'Errance.

languages.text: Durante muchos años, Yrliet viajó junto a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ayudándol{mf|e|a} a desentrañar los secretos de razas xenos perdidas y prestándole el saber de los suyos. Medio siglo más tarde, sintió que era el momento de decir adiós: había llegado al final de la Senda del Proscrito.
languages.original_text: For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her kind. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.

traits.locale_text: Durante muchos años, Yrliet viajó junto a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente, ayudándol{mf|e|a} a desentrañar los secretos de razas xenos perdidas y prestándole el saber de su gente. Medio siglo más tarde, sintió que era el momento de decir adiós: había llegado al final de la Senda del Proscrito.

languages.text: 長きにわたり、自由開拓者の傍らで旅を続けてきたユリエットは、失われた異種族たちの秘義を解き明かすことに協力しながら、同族の知恵を貸し与えてきた。半世紀もの時が経ち、別れを告げる時が訪れたことを彼女は感じていた。追放者の道がついに終わりを迎えたのだ。
languages.original_text: For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her kind. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.

traits.locale_text: 長きにわたり、自由開拓者の傍らで旅を続けてきたユリエットは、失われた異種族たちの秘義を解き明かすことに協力しながら、同族の知恵を貸し与えてきた。半世紀もの時が経ち、別れを告げる時が訪れたことを彼女は感じていた。追放者の道がついに終わりを迎えたのだ。

languages.text: Yrliet; uzun yıllar boyunca Hür Tacir'in yanında seyahat etti, kayıp zeno ırklarının sırlarını deşifre etmesine yardımcı oldu ve türünün bilgi birikimini onunla paylaştı. Yarım yüzyıl sonra da veda vaktinin geldiğini hissetti. Yurtsuzun Yolu tamamlanmıştı.
languages.original_text: For many long years, Yrliet travelled at the Rogue Trader's side, helping {mf|him|her} decipher the secrets of lost xenos races and lending {mf|him|her} the wisdom of her kind. Half a century later, she sensed that it was time to say goodbye — the Path of the Outcast had come to an end.

traits.locale_text: Yrliet uzun yıllar boyunca Hür Tacir'in yanında seyahat etti, kayıp zeno ırklarının sırlarını deşifre etmekte ona yardımcı oldu ve türünün sahip olduğu bilgileri onunla paylaştı. Yarım yüzyıl sonra da veda vaktinin geldiğini hissetti. Yurtsuzun Yolu tamamlanmıştı.
